thread.title: Tiger in Hungarian zoo treated with stem cells for pain relief

title: Tiger in Hungarian zoo treated with stem cells for pain relief
text:
Tiger in Hungarian zoo treated with stem cells for pain relief  03 
A Siberian tiger in a Hungarian zoo receives stem cell joint treatment which doctors hope will help heal his hip and allow him to live happily without needing to be given painkillers. Jim Drury reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A Siberian tiger in a Hungarian zoo receives stem cell joint treatment which doctors hope will help heal his hip and allow him to live happily without needing to be given painkillers. Jim Drury reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2JV5QyR
